org.formix.btb

Class PropertyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.formix.btb.PropertyFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class PropertyFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Defines a comparison between a property and a value.
    Author:
    Jean-Philippe Gravel
    See Also:
    Comparators, Filter

      • PropertyFilter

        public PropertyFilter(Class<?> type,
                      String property,
                      Comparators comparator,
                      Object value)
        Creates a new instance of the class using the specified property name, comparator and value.
        Parameters:
        type - The type corresponding to the property (may be null)
        property - The name of the property.
        comparator - The comparator used.
        value - The value to compare with.

      • PropertyFilter

        public PropertyFilter(String property,
                      Object value)
        Creates a new instance of the class using the specified property name and value. The comparator is defaulted to Comparators.EQUAL.
        Parameters:
        property - The name of the property.
        value - The value to compare with.
